Key:
If I were to choose... I'd choose Kaguya and
Yuzuru, I guess.

Well said, Shido, I knew you were the Knight I
approved!
Naturally. Shido belongs to Kaguya and Yuzuru.

Why did you choose the Yamais, Shido?! Is it
the food? They're bribing you with food, aren't
they?
No, no, no, of course not!

Whaaat, darling?! I know that Kaguya-san and
Yuzuru-san are cute, but... I want you to date
me today!

Shido, you're supposed to go out with me, your
girlfriend.
*grunt*... This isn't going anywhere.

(I know! At a time like this... I'm going to have
to call the Fraxinus for help...)

(Whenever I run into issues, they always give me
some pointers or instructions. They should be
able to save me from this situation...!)
Oh, you seem to be in trouble, Shido.
Perfect timing, Kotori.

(My little sister Kotori is the Commander of the
Fraxinus. She should be a dependable advisor at
a time like this... I think.)
Can you solve this problem for me?
Hmm. The girls in front of you, aside from\nOrigami, may possibly go berserk if you\nhurt them carelessly. You know that, right?
I know that. That's why I'm struggling.
And you're going to choose the Yamai Sisters,\nknowing that?

Yeah. If I choose them, I can gain two people's
affections. I know it's not just about numbers,
but it's not the worst decision in all this chaos.
I see. Well, surprisingly, it looks like you've\nthought it through for once. Then you do that.\nI'll handle the others.
Got it, thanks.
All right, Kaguya, Yuzuru! Let's run!
Roger. We are escaping.

Who are you talking to, Shido? Godspeed is
defined by me.

(And so I ran off with the Yamai Sisters.
It was fine until...)
You guys, can you give me more personal space?

I can't accommodate that request. This volition
comes from the depths of the dark world.
Your fate is to be cursed.

Translating. Kaguya wants to stick to you and
doesn't want to part.

I get it, but it's hard to walk. And Yuzuru, um...
don't rub up against me so much.

Offended. I cannot help it. Compared to Kaguya,
I am more voluptuous, I can't help it.

Hey! Yuzuru, you're trying to subtly score
points! And you need to move away from him.
It's not fair how much more you have to touch!

Rebuttal. The distance between us is equal.
We must maintain fairness as Shido belongs to
both of us. This is just your personal issue.

That's not fair! Then I'm going to push my body
up against him.
Hey, Kaguya! Don't go forcing yourself on me.
Advice. Shido, just give up.
No, but... Where are we going like this?

Heh... Fear not, Shido. The wind will guide us
to our destination.

Translation. Kaguya is saying she hasn't really
decided on a place yet.

Yeah, got it. Let's just go to a café or
something. We can sit and rest...

Agreed. How about the café at the station over
there?

I'm telling you now, but... I don't have too
much money this month. So I won't be able to
pay for you guys.

Foolish statement. I would never go against my
sister's suggestion. Besides, as long as I am
with you, I will go to hell and back. However...
Hm? What is it?

Before that, you must fulfill a wish of ours.
You must go to the depths of Hades and
perform the secret ceremony.

Explaining. Shido, Kaguya wants to use the
restroom.

That really sounded more complicated than
it was. I think there's a bathroom at the
station.

Ahh... But at that rate, my seal will have
broken.

Suggestion. Yuzuru will take care of Shido. So,
Kaguya, go to the bathroom or anywhere you
choose.

I can't do that! While I'm away, you also
have to be separated from Shido.
Rejection. Yuzuru has no reason to leave.

Grr... Then I'm going to endure it. Yuzuru and
I are one. Until you leave, I vow to not leave
either.
No, no, you don't look fine at all, though.

Resolution. Shido and Yuzuru should go to the
bathroom with you.
I can't do that! Hey, what the—?! Don't pull me!

(They somehow pushed me in front of the
bathroom, but...)

(Yuzuru went with Kaguya... No matter how
close they are, I hope they didn't get into the
same stall together...)
Reunited. Sorry for the wait, Shido.

Heh, you're waiting there loyally. That's a good
mindset, my servant.
...You guys are really close.
Of course. Kaguya and Yuzuru used to be one.
We're pretty much soulmates.

Come to think of it, you guys are considered
sisters at school, but who's the older sister?
Isn't it obvious? It would be Kaguya.

Foolish statement. It doesn't really matter, but
rather than the slender Kaguya, Yuzuru is
better fit as the older sister.

O-Our physique shouldn't matter! Yuzuru,
you're still a child too.
Declaration. It's the easiest way to tell.
Then let's battle to see who's the better fit.

Understood. Let us battle to see who is more
like an older sister.
Hey, don't fight! It doesn't matter!

Very well. If you say so, Shido. This can be a
draw in your favor. What do you say, Yuzuru?
Laugh. Are you running, Kaguya?
Stop! We're going to the café, aren't we?

Upset. Very well, that is more important right
now.

(I'm glad it settled down. But I guess they still
might battle...)
